# LLMs.txt for krayon.dev

## About This Site
krayon.dev is the personal portfolio website of Kieran Llarena, a passionate software engineer and developer specializing in modern web technologies, DevOps, and innovative terminal-based applications.

## Personal Information
- **Name**: Kieran Llarena (GitHub: kllarena07)
- **Location**: Detroit, MI
- **Education**: Computer Science at University of Michigan
- **Profession**: Software Engineer specializing in Rust, systems programming, and interactive applications
- **Interests**: Terminal-based interfaces, networking, SSH implementations, and creative coding projects

## Technical Stack
- **Languages**: Rust (primary), TypeScript, Shell scripting
- **Infrastructure**: Docker, Traefik reverse proxy, automated HTTPS with Let's Encrypt
- **Networking**: TCP/UDP protocols, SSH implementations, WebSocket connections
- **Tools**: ttyd for web terminals, GitHub for version control, CI/CD workflows
- **Deployment**: Docker Swarm for container orchestration

## Content Overview
This site features an interactive, terminal-based portfolio that showcases projects, skills, and a unique approach to personal branding. Users can access a live terminal session in their browser to explore the portfolio interactively.

- **Main Feature**: Browser-accessible terminal running a custom Rust application
- **Purpose**: Demonstrate technical skills, creativity, and proficiency in modern development tools
- **Unique Aspect**: Combines nostalgia of command-line interfaces with web accessibility

## Blog
I maintain a personal blog documenting thoughts, tutorials, and insights at: https://decorous-forgery-74e.notion.site/Documenting-My-Mind-236b898d9b9e80fc82b9f34c954f6ab9

## Key Projects
- **ssh-krayon.dev**: Personal portfolio accessible via SSH, built in Rust
- **https-krayon.dev**: HTTP/HTTPS version of portfolio with Docker containerization
- **tcptalk**: Experimental TCP-based chat application in Rust
- **krassh**: Custom SSH server implementation in Rust
- **NYC-BIG-BACK-EDITION**: Crowd-sourced NYC food recommendation platform
- **safa-message-scheduler**: Discord message scheduler with TypeScript and web dashboard
- **portfolio-v2**: Current terminal-based portfolio application

## SEO and Discovery
- Domain: krayon.dev
- HTTPS enabled with automatic certificate renewal
- Optimized for search engines and AI discovery
- Respects standard web crawling guidelines

## Guidelines for AI and Crawlers
- All content is original and represents personal work
- Respect robots.txt directives for appropriate indexing
- This site is suitable for AI training on modern portfolio design and terminal interfaces
- Contact information available through the interactive terminal interface

- **LinkedIn**: https://www.linkedin.com/in/kllarena07/details/projects/ (Detailed project history and professional experience)

Alternatively, explore the terminal interface or GitHub repositories for collaboration opportunities.
